# 3rdparty

This directory contains bundled packages within the Mesos repository.

## Bundled Packages

  - [boost](boost.md)
  - [concurrentqueue](concurrentqueue.md)
  - csi
  - elfio
  - glog
  - gtest
  - gperftools
  - grpc
  - http-parser
  - leveldb
  - libev
  - nvml
  - picojson
  - pip
  - [protobuf](protobuf.md)
  - [rapidjson](rapidjson.md)
  - setuptools
  - wheel
  - zookeeper
  - curl (Windows-only)
  - libapr (Windows-only)
  - zlib (Windows-only)
